greenmirror

Class CommandHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenmirror.CommandHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddNodeCommandHandler, AddRelationCommandHandler, ChangeNodeFxCommandHandler, EndTransitionCommandHandler, ExitVisualizerCommandHandler, FlushCommandHandler, InitializationCommandHandler, RemoveNodeCommandHandler, RemoveRelationCommandHandler, SetAnimationDurationCommandHandler, SetNodeFxCommandHandler, StartVisualizationCommandHandler, SwitchPlacementRelationCommandHandler

    public abstract class CommandHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that handles commands received over the network. Every subclass should have at least one of the ClientSide and ServerSide annotations to indicate on which part of the application they are used.
    Author:
    Karim El Assal

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CommandHandler.DataParseException
      An Exception to indicate that the received data couldn't be parsed correctly.
      static class  CommandHandler.MissingDataException
      An Exception to indicate that the received data is incomplete.

    • Method Detail

      • getController

        public GreenMirrorController getController()
        Returns:
        the GreenMirror controller

      • getCommand

        public @NonNull java.lang.String getCommand()
        Returns a one word description of this command handler. For example, an instance of AddNodeCommandHandler would let this method return AddNode.
        Returns:
        the textual, one word description of the command belonging to this command handler

      • setController

        public void setController(@NonNull GreenMirrorController controller)
        Parameters:
        controller - the GreenMirror controller to store for later use

      • handle

        public abstract void handle(@NonNull CommunicationFormat format,
                            @NonNull java.lang.String data)
                     throws CommandHandler.MissingDataException,
                            CommandHandler.DataParseException
        The method that actually handles the received Command. The Command is passed via data in the specified communication format. The controller should've already been set.
        Parameters:
        format - the communication format in which data is formatted
        data - the string representation of the received Command
        Throws:
        CommandHandler.MissingDataException - when the data is incomplete
        CommandHandler.DataParseException - when the data can't be parsed correctly
        See Also:
        CommunicationFormat, setController(GreenMirrorController)

      • parseJson

        public static @NonNull java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parseJson(@NonNull java.lang.String data)
                                                                           throws CommandHandler.DataParseException
        Parse JSON data.
        Parameters:
        data - the JSON data
        Returns:
        a Map containing the parsed data
        Throws:
        CommandHandler.DataParseException - if the JSON string was invalid
